title: Farfalle with Arugula Pesto
summary: Farfalle with Arugula Pesto might be just the side dish you are searching for. This recipe serves 6. One portion of this dish contains around 11g of protein, 14g of fat, and a total of 362 calories. For $1.08 per serving, this recipe covers 10% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe from My Recipes has 1 fans. A mixture of farfalle pasta, cherry tomatoes, arugula pesto, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 54%. This score is pretty good. Try Shrimp Farfalle with Arugula Pesto, Arugula-Walnut Pesto Farfalle, and Farfalle with Arugulan and White Beans for similar recipes.
instructions: In a 5- to 6-quart pan over high heat, bring 4 quarts water to a boil; add beans and cook just until barely tender to bite, about 1 minute. With a skimmer or slotted spoon, remove from water and transfer to a colander; rinse under cold running water until cool.                                                                                                 Bring water back to a boil. Add farfalle and cook until tender to bite, 14 to 16 minutes. Drain.                                                                                                 In a large bowl, mix pasta, beans, and 3/4 cup pesto. If more sauce is desired, add up to 1/4 cup more pesto. Top with cheese and halved cherry tomatoes.

steps.step: In a 5- to 6-quart pan over high heat, bring 4 quarts water to a boil; add beans and cook just until barely tender to bite, about 1 minute. With a skimmer or slotted spoon, remove from water and transfer to a colander; rinse under cold running water until cool.
Bring water back to a boil.
Add farfalle and cook until tender to bite, 14 to 16 minutes.
In a large bowl, mix pasta, beans, and 3/4 cup pesto. If more sauce is desired, add up to 1/4 cup more pesto. Top with cheese and halved cherry tomatoes.
